{"id":1284127189,"question_id":6,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1718043697,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1284127189/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"13.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if (numRows == 1 || numRows >= s.length()) return s;\n\n        vector<string> rows(numRows);\n        int curRow = 0;\n        bool goingDown = false;\n\n        for (char c : s) {\n            rows[curRow] += c;\n\n            if (curRow == 0 || curRow == numRows - 1) {\n                goingDown = !goingDown;\n            }\n\n            curRow += goingDown ? 1 : -1;\n        }\n\n        string result;\n        for (string row : rows) {\n            result += row;\n        }\n\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":56}
